articles.author: Phil Mattingly, Kevin Liptak and Kaitlan Collins, CNN
articles.title: Inside Biden's response to the end of Roe v. Wade
articles.description: When President Joe Biden received word from his chief of staff in the Oval Office on Friday that the Supreme Court had decided to strip away the nationwide right to abortion, he quickly began to execute a plan his advisers had been crafting for months.

articles.author: Veronica Stracqualursi, CNN
articles.title: 'Pro-mom, pro-baby, pro-life': People at anti-abortion convention celebrate Roe's downfall and focus on 'long battle ahead'
articles.description: Attendees at the National Right to Life Convention had nearly filled a hotel conference room Friday for a conservative author's talk when the news broke around 10 a.m. ET.

articles.title: Video: See Planned Parenthood leader's response to Liz Cheney Supreme Court tweet - CNN Video
articles.description: Planned Parenthood Federation of America President and CEO Alexis McGill Johnson reacts to a tweet from Republican Rep. Liz Cheney on the Supreme Court ruling overturning Roe v. Wade.

articles.title: Video: How the Supreme Court ruling could impact women with serious health conditions - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Jake Tapper talks to OB-GYN Dr. Jennifer Gunter about how the Supreme Court decision to overturn Roe v. Wade could affect women's health.

articles.author: Rob Picheta and Arnaud Siad, CNN
articles.title: US allies express dismay at 'appalling' Supreme Court decision to scrap abortion rights
articles.description: Several of the United States' Western allies responded with anger and dismay after the Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade on Friday, condemning the decision as "horrific," "appalling" and "a big step backwards."

articles.author: Joan Biskupic, CNN legal analyst & Supreme Court biographer
articles.title: Analysis: Conservative justices seized the moment and delivered the opinion they'd long promised
articles.description: The five-justice Supreme Court bloc that overturned a half century of women's abortion rights on Friday had coalesced less than two years. But they had found their moment and they seized it.
